title: Fusion Spa
description: This portfolio! A fun personal project to showcase my work. Inspired by Art Deco, this site is a reflection of my celebration of life and my entrance into the world of web developpemnt, a place where I could try new ideas and let my creativity shine!
items: Suttle yet interesting animations, a challenging creative design

title: The Menu - Recipe App
description: A recipe creation platform dedicated to cooking enthusiasts. A user-friendly interface allowing users to input ingredients, cooking instructions, photos, and other relevant details for their recipes. This phase aims to establish a strong foundation by enabling users to create accounts, facilitating the recording, management, and access to their personal recipes within the application.
items: Highlights Include: A complex form where users can creat and modify a recipe. Tools for classifying recipes by type, cuisine, dietary preferences
User Account Management: Allowing users to create personal accounts
Technical Details: object-oriented React components. TypeScript, Bootsrap, Javascript. Responsive design

title: Prima-Colors - Festival Website
description: The objective of this project was to design a captivating website for the Prima-Colors Festival highlighting a variety of activities such as a contest, worhshops, Dj performances and much more. The festival targeted a dynamic clientele aged 18 to 40, passionate about arts, music, and creativity. The website's mission was to meet their expectations by offering a modern experience that combined technology and enjoyment.
items: Highlights Include: An extensive admin section for employes to dynamically create, update or delete content from the site
The use of reusable components within a Laravel framework
